page.title: 15Games we play (ii)
page.content: {e) Sardines}:in this game one person hides and the rest count. Once they reach 100 they look for the hider, and once he's found they hide with him until the last person arrives. {f) Stuck-in-the-mud}:There's one person that chases the rest, and when they touch you, you are stuck.You then open your legs, until somebody crawls under, which releases you. You have 3 lives. {g) Bod}:This game is like catch, but when a person comes to catch you, you go down quickly and say "Bod" but if they catch you before, your'e on it. {h) Home }:One person is on it and all the rest have to run around.Then you have to link arms. Then,if you are touched you are on it.
